languages.text: "Ризза, встав на сторону Архиврага, ты предала самого Императора. За это ты приговариваешься к смерти. Сгинь, еретичка!"

traits.locale_text: "Ризза, встав на сторону Архиврага, ты предала самого Императора. За это ты приговариваешься к смерти. Сгинь, еретичка!"

languages.text: "Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"
languages.original_text: "Ризза, встав на сторону Архиврага, ты предала самого Императора. За это ты приговариваешься к смерти. Сгинь, еретичка!"

"Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"

languages.text: “莱萨，你与混沌大敌勾结，背叛了帝皇。我在此判处你死刑。死吧，异端分子！”
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: “莱萨，你与混沌大敌勾结，背叛了帝皇。我在此判处你死刑。死吧，异端分子！”

languages.text: 「ライツァ、渾沌の勢力と協力することで、お前は皇帝ご本人を裏切った。よって、ここにてお前を死刑にする。死ね！異端者が！」
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: 「ライツァ、渾沌の勢力と協力することで、お前は皇帝ご本人を裏切った。よって、お前を死刑にする。死ね！異端者が！」

languages.text: «Ryzza, al ponerse de lado del archienemigo, ha traicionado al mismísimo Emperador, por lo que queda sentenciada a muerte. ¡Muerte a la hereje!».
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: «Ryzza, al ponerse de lado del archienemigo, ha traicionado al mismísimo Emperador, por lo que está sentenciada a muerte. ¡Muerte al hereje!».

languages.text: "Ryzza, indem Ihr Euch auf die Seite des Erzfeinds geschlagen habt, habt Ihr den Imperator selbst verraten. Dafür werdet Ihr hiermit zum Tode verurteilt. Sterbt, Ketzerin!"
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: "Ryzza, indem Ihr Euch auf die Seite des Erzfeinds geschlagen habt, habt Ihr den Imperator selbst verraten. Dafür werdet Ihr zum Tode verurteilt. Sterbt, Ketzerin!"

languages.text: « Ryzza, en vous alliant au Grand Ennemi, vous avez trahi l'Empereur Lui-même. Pour ce crime, je vous condamne à mort. Adieu, hérétique ! »
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: « Ryzza, en vous alliant au Grand Ennemi, vous avez trahi l'Empereur Lui-même. Pour ce crime, je vous condamne à mort. Adieu, hérétique ! »

languages.text: "Ryzza, Şerbaşı'nın yanında yer alarak bizzat İmparator Hazretleri'ne ihanet etmiş oldun. Bu sebeple de seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum. Geber kâfir!"
languages.original_text: "Ryzza, by siding with the Archenemy, you have betrayed the Emperor Himself. For this, you are hereby sentenced to death. Perish, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: "Ryzza, Şerbaşı'nın yanında yer alarak bizzat İmparator Hazretleri'ne ihanet etmiş oldun. Bu sebeple de seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum. Geber kâfir!"
